unittitle_ssm: Brooklyn Sixth Ward, First Election District poll list
abstract_ssm: Poll list compiled in 1871 by the Clerks of Election of the First Election District of the Sixth Ward of Brooklyn from the results of an 1870 election.  The list includes the names and addresses of 1,328 voters, as well as marks indicating which issues each person voted upon.
